title: CPS: Transportation x Disability Category x Race

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Provide records sufficient to show:

1. The total number of students who check "Yes" in the Transportation section of an IEP in school years 2021/2022, 2022/2023, 2023/2024. Please provide this data by disability category broken down by race per disability category. 

2. The total number of students who have IEPs in school years 2021/2022, 2022/2023, 2023/2024 to date by disability category broken down by race per disability category.

3. The total number of students who have Behavior Intervention Plans in school years 2021/2022, 2022/2023, 2023/2024 to date by disability category broken down by race.

4. The total number of students who have Behavior Intervention Plans and check "Yes" in the Transportation section of an IEP in school years 2021/2022, 2022/2023, 2023/2024 to date by disability category broken down by race by disability category. 

Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit The FOIA Bakery’s work to advocate for public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c). Feel free to contact me with any questions, or if clarification is needed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani

title: Title IX complaints - University of Nevada, Las Vegas

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: Title IX complaints - University of Nevada, Las Vegas
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- Any and all Title IX complaints involving The University of Nevada, Las Vegas during the academic years 2021-2022, 2022-2023, 2023-2024
- Any records relating to Title IX complaints filed from January 1, 2024 to the present date.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jessica Cabrera

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: Title IX Annual Report
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- Any and all records related to the Title IX annual report announced by Brian Sandoval on Oct. 13, 2023  (Reference to the related article: https://www.unr.edu/nevada-today/news/president-messages/2023-10-13-information-and-updates-on-the-office-of-equal-opportunity-and-title-ix )
- Any and all communications regarding the creation and development of the Title IX report
- Spreadsheets or documents on the raw data from the report, provided as a .pdf or .csv file.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jessica Cabrera
